title: Peter Kay Gives Tour Money to Help Sick People
summary: Peter Kay is a famous comedian who is going on a big tour in 2026. He has decided to give all the money he makes from the tour to 12 charities that help people with cancer. This means the charities will get more money to do their important work. Peter Kay said that many people know someone who has been affected by cancer, and he hopes everyone will support the tour to help these charities. Some of the charities, like Blood Cancer UK and The Brain Tumour Charity, are very happy and thankful for his help. Tickets for the tour are on sale soon, so people can buy them to see the show and support a good cause.

Article_Structure: WHO: Peter Kay, a comedian from Bolton
WHAT: Donating all profits from his 2026 tour to 12 cancer charities
WHY: To support charities helping people affected by cancer

perspectives.description: He wants to help charities and encourages people to support the cause, even if they don't like his comedy.
They are very grateful and see this as an important way to raise funds and awareness for cancer support.
